titleStmt.title: The petition of the inhabitants of Cyrencester, whose names are hereunto subscribed. Presented to His Majesty at Oxford. With His Majesties answer therunto.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I) aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, by His Majesties command at Oxford [i.e. London], Febr. 28. By Leonard Lichfield, Printer to the University,

notesStmt.note: Signed by forty six men, p. 3.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
